content: minecraft bees supplies stitch glossary crochet hook i used 5 mm single_crochet = single_crochet sewing needle half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet stuffing scbp = single_crochet back post yarn i used red heart super st3bptg = stitch three back posts together saver invisible st3tog = stitch three scs together using only o yellow the front loops of the row below o brown corner series = in a single stitch on the corner of your o black square crochet a single_crochet a half_double_crochet and another single_crochet all in that o white same stitch this creates a distinct corner invisible color changes there are many color changes throughout this pattern to keep the colors from two adjacent but different colored stitches from look messy do an invisible color change let s say you re switching from yellow to black during your last yellow stitch gather all the loops of yarn required by the specific stitch type you are doing on your hook in yellow except for the very last loop yarn over in black yarn for this very last loop and pull it through all the yellow loops on your hook to finish off your stitch the crochet stitch you just finished will still be all yellow but the loop on your hook will be black now you are ready to crochet your first black stitch below is an example of finishing off a last yellow single_crochet stitch before a color change to black body crochet with rounds joined at the end of every round slip_stitch into first stitch and chain 1 to get up to the level of the next round round 1 with yellow single_crochet 8 into magic_ring 8 round 2 single_crochet 1 corner series in next stitch x 4 16 you should now have a square shape with 4 distinct corners round 3 single_crochet corner series single_crochet switch to black yarn then 2 single_crochet start a corner series at the corner but only do the first stitch in black do the second two stitches of the corner series in the series in yellow yarn 3 single_crochet start a corner series with the first two stitches in yellow and the last in black continue with 2 single_crochet in black then 1 single_crochet in yellow finish the round in yellow with a corner series then 2 single_crochet 24 round 4 single_crochet corner series 2 single_crochet in black 3 single_crochet in yellow corner series 5 single_crochet corner series in black 3 single_crochet in yellow 2 single_crochet corner series 4 single_crochet 32 rounds 3 and 4 body continued round 5 6 scbp in yellow 3 scbp in black 11 scbp in yellow 3 scbp in black you are now done with black so you can tie that end off 9 scbp in yellow 32 round 6-8 single_crochet around at the end of round 8 do your slip_stitch like normal but switch to brown yarn before chain 1 up to next row 32 round 9 single_crochet around in brown 32 round 10 single_crochet around in yellow 32
